2014 CH2M/Pembina Observations and Recom: Topsoil depth could not be assessed during this survey and vegetation establishment was low. Recommend monitoring during the third year PCEM.
Status of Landowner Issues and Concerns: Re-assess during the third year PCEM program in 2015.
See above.
2015 CH2M Observations and Comments: Several small areas (approximately 5 m in diameter) were observed where subsoil was encountered at the surface along the right-of-way.
2015 Recommendations: Redistribute or import additional clean topsoil or amend soil with locally available manure/compost at these locations. Monitor any seeding efforts in 2016 and during the fifth year of the PCEM program in 2017.

2013 Notes: Erosion issue observed from KP 10.64 to KP 10.84 (50 cm wide, 20 cm deep).

2013 Notes: Establishment issue observed from KP 11.00 to KP 11.49 along entire quarter-section. Vegetation parameters on right-of-way not equal to vegetation parameters off right-of-way. Area has been recently disturbed. No reseeding evident.

LAContacted landowner in the spring to discuss the upcoming right-of-way inspection by CH2M. andowner comments: No concerns or issues. ugust 2015: Landowner requested copy of environmental report. Report was received in October 2015.

2015 Recommendations: Repair erosion, reseed and monitor area for stability and vegetation establishment in 2016 and during the fifth year of the PCEM program in 2017. Livestock may need to be excluded from the area to achieve positive results.

2015 Recommendations: Repair erosion, reseed and monitor area for stability and vegetation establishment in 2016 and during the fifth year of the PCEM program in 2017. Livestock may need to be excluded from the area to achieve positive results.
